metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9922 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The cirrus_do_copy function in hw/display/cirrus_vga.c in QEMU (aka Quick Emulator), when cirrus graphics mode is VGA, allows local guest OS privileged users to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and QEMU process crash) via vectors involving blit pitch values.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Qinghao Tang, Li Qiang, and Jiangxin

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
